metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart's evil ending in which she executes clerics of Selune and Shar and becomes the prophet / founder of a new faith.
metadata.how_to_trigger: -> Start game as Avatar Shadowheart-> Ctrl + 9 to Open Debug book-> Quests and Flags-> Act 3 (END)-> Master End Setup-> Agree to go to endgame-> Go back to master set up as above-> Skip Party configuration and do setup-> Emperor is mindflayer with stones-> Skip through following few options-> Choose to go to Defeat of Brain-> The Final decision scene will trigger-> Select the option to betray emperor and become the absolute-> Skip through rest of the scene into evil avatar scene-> Skip through until first question hold-> Chose fist option 'For too long, you allowed yourself...-> Evil Shadowheart will start here

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *Which path calls to you, darkness or light?*
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart begins to walk through the awestruck kneeling crowd, eyes fixed ahead as she passes

4.speaker: Narrator
4.text: *Who you were, or what you may yet become?*
4.context: CinematicNodeContext: Profile shot from the right, from the crowd's POV - SH's magic flares up as she walks, lining her in Shar's black and purple. Reverse shot from the other side, her magic now flaring Selune's radiant white.

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *But Shar and Selûne's war need not be yours. Their fracture only weakened them both, and pitted their followers against each other.*
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: SH approaches a line of priests who are shoved roughly to their knees before her. Each wears the insignia of either Shar or Selune, though they've become hopelessly muddled as the crowd hems them in from each side.

3.speaker: Narrator
3.text: *You shall indulge their ancient follies no longer. A new church will rise; united, in your image, and blessed with the blood of the faithless.*
3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart smiles, her magic flickering between dark and light before ultimately melding into a twilight grey with accents of each.

2.speaker: Narrator
2.text: *Your heart swells with silver and shadow alike, and the undying love of countless followers. At last, you are whole.*
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart gestures at the waiting crowd, who fall upon the terrified clerics with nails and teeth. As we pull up and away from the shining figure in the midst of the seething mass of bodies, we see the Netherbrain pulse with power high above - and the sky itself take on the mingled colour's of Shadowheart's new church.
